thread.title: MusicNews | Watch: Apple release official vid for Hotline Bling. Internet very enamored with Drake's dance moves
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Watch: Apple release official vid for Hotline Bling. Internet very enamored with Drake's dance moves - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: MusicNews | Watch: Apple release official vid for Hotline Bling. Internet very enamored with Drake's dance moves
text:
This is pretty special. It resonates with a lot of people on many levels. And we're just talking about Drake's moves. He's got some light body popping. He's got 'The Husband Step'. He's even got a bit of Granddad Latino in there.
Seemingly he's also introduced a bit of "Arab uncle at a wedding."
Drake dancing like an Arab uncle at a wedding pic.twitter.com/ipDuDeXBtc
— Serwan Roman (@SusRomallana) October 20, 2015
Overall, the Internet is exceptionally impressed with his dancing prowess and the range of emotions he's managed to convey. If dance is a universal language, then Drake is it's TEFL instructor. Or something.
When you're the only one on the dance floor #HotlineBling #drake pic.twitter.com/2sHKdHtbr8
— Jesse Stellwagon (@StellyJ) October 20, 2015
According to Rolling Stone : "'Hotline Bling' has also become a popular track to cover for other artists. Everyone from Nick Jonas to Erykah Badu have either covered the song live or recorded it to distribute online. Badu's remix in particular reimagines the song from her perspective and interpolates not only her own single 'On and On' but her ex-boyfriend Andre 3000's hit 'Ms. Jackson' as well."
MORE: Pics: Lena Dunham explains why she quit twitter, and removed Instagram underwear pic
